# rlookup

[![AppVeyor Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/IqisGnahz/rlookup?branch=dev&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/IqisGnahz/rlookup)
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/IqisGnahz/rlookup.svg?branch=dev)](https://travis-ci.org/IqisGnahz/rlookup)


Lookup utilities for recoding strings in a data frame.

## Installation

You can install rlookup from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("IqisGnahz/rlookup")
```
